title: What is Sony Santa Monica's Unannounced Game? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.20.21
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about what non-God of War Ragnarok game Sony Santa Monica is working on, Fall Guys not coming to Game Pass, and more.

00:00:00 - Start
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now. It’s our Fantasy Video Game Draft. Me, Imran, Tim, and Greg battle it out and draft games based on what we think will score highest on Metacritic. That’s available right now on Youtube and podcast services.
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:40 - Sony Santa Monica is looking for folks to work on an 'unannounced new project' - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:24:45 - Fall Guys is not coming to Xbox Game Pass - Austin Wood @ Gamesradar
00:28:15 - Team Ninja Is Not Working On New Ninja Gaiden Or Nioh Projects - Jeremy Winslow @ Gamespot
00:35:55 - The Man Who Created Captain Falcon, Fox McCloud, Majora's Mask and More Has Retired from Nintendo - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:40:30 -  Ad
00:42:20 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:45:00 - How many big games do you think will be pushed out of the 2021 window? - ComradeBleu
00:51:35 - Bless Asks : Tell me about the game you're most excited for this year and why?
00:59:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
